Name: Cornwall Negroni
Ingredients: 15 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: A Negroni-style cocktail served up. Heavy on the gin and relatively light on bitter liqueur and vermouth. It's a formula that works but like us, you may prefer yours served on the rocks.
History: Created in 2006 by Philip Ward , New York, USA after attending Gary "gaz" Regan 's Cocktails in the Country workshop in Cornwall-on-Hudson.
Nutrition: One serving of Cornwall Negroni contains 211 calories
